TopicTitle: F14 a MothKat ( f14 tomcat replica )

Articles.Content:
Hello all! Ive decided to try my hand at making some replica planes! And the f14 tomcat had to be the first...here's a link to a vid of a simple flight to show her off ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I will be doing higher quality vids and putting in all the details you nerdy kerbanaughts love ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) so please take a looksee and please let me know what you think! 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/s0dp-X7HCzI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-07T21:27:49Z" title="07/07/2015 09:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 7, 2015</time> by Mothy**

i finished making one of these myself earlier today, (yet to upload anything) but i noticed a couple of things that could be done better very easily. particularly the cockpit position and nose section. the f-14 cockpit ends about 1/4-1/3 of it's length behind where the intake vents start, and the nose section itself is roughly 1/2 the length of the rest of the plane. (1/3 total length)
